title: Sandworm Hackers Target Ukrainian Organizations With Data-Wiping Malware

content.raw: Russia-aligned threat actor Sandworm has intensified its destructive cyber operations against Ukrainian organizations, deploying data wiper malware to cripple critical infrastructure and weaken the nation’s economy. Unlike other Russia-aligned advanced persistent threat groups that primarily engage in cyberespionage activities, Sandworm’s operations are characterized by their explicitly destructive intent. According to the latest ESET APT Activity […] The post Sandworm Hackers Target Ukrainian Organizations With Data-Wiping Malware appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
